name: Inconvo
long_description:
Inconvo makes it a breeze for developers to give users a conversational AI interface for application data analysis. 

The API accepts users' questions, queries your database and returns answers in text, chart or table format.

Inconvo is not just another text-to-SQL tool! It is purpose built to remove the challenges of building user-facing conversational data analysis.
one_liner: The API that answers usersâ€™ questions on SaaS application data.
